item.title: About
item.author: sudarshan85@gmail.com (Sudarshan)
item.description: I am Sudarshan, PhD candidate at University of Tennessee (UTK) in the Electrical Engineering & Computer Science (EECS) department. My interests are in deep learning, natural language processing, and healthcare AI. I am part of Oak Ridge National Laboratory (ORNL) where I work on the Open Source Lab project. For my PhD work, I am focusing on efficiently mining electronic health records (EHR) for medical representation and utilizing them for building better downstream applications.
